p: 10 Swiss albino mice (4-6 weeks old) were obtained from the Animal House, Jahangirnagar University, Savar, Dhaka. Animals were housed in the experimental room and given a standard diet. We complied with the international ethical guidelines to deal with the animals, and the procedures were approved by the Institutional Animal, Medical Ethics, Biosafety and Biosecurity Committee (225/230-IAMEBBC/IBSc), Institute of Biological Sciences, University of Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
